typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	skiplines as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> loans
loans sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	emptyLinesAsHeader: (toInteger($skiplines)),
	partitionFileNames:['skippedrows.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
